2019860.name: Enjaulados
2019860.description:
b]STORY[/b]

Our protagonist is called Sirius, a teenager whose name comes from the star Alpha Canis Maioris, the brightest star in the entire night sky. But Sirius currently feels that she doesn't light up. She is bored with the monotony, tired of the screens, the noise coming from the platforms and the constant consumption of empty entertainment. But her world will change and her cage of screens will become a cage of magic books. Sirius will live great adventures while making very special friends. Our protagonist will go through labyrinths and platforms through fantastic worlds, will solve puzzles and will have to defeat the evil Kovalev. Enjaulados is a very indie video game, full of fantasy and color, based on books, artworks and utopian architectures that made us fly.

Audio in Spanish. Subtitles in Spanish, English and Italian.
2019860.supported_languages:
西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 英语, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
